Commun Name : Mini Orchid

Cientific Name: Phalaenopsis

Kingdom/Family: Plantae/Asparagaceae

Plant Categories: Indoor,Flower, Folliage Plant

Rating:

Only:

20,00 €

No shipping available

Description:

A mini orchid, also known as a miniature orchid, is a small-sized orchid plant with compact growth and petite flowers. These charming orchids typically have smaller leaves and blooms compared to their larger counterparts. Despite their diminutive size, mini orchids exhibit intricate and captivating features.Mini orchids come in a variety of species and hybrid cultivars, offering a diverse range of colors and patterns. Their blooms can be delicate and vibrant, showcasing shades of white, pink, purple, yellow, or a combination thereof. Some mini orchids may even display intricate markings or patterns on their petals, adding to their allure.

Additional Information:

Light Requirements: Moderate to bright indirect light

Watering: Allow the soil to dry partially between waterings

Temperature: Average room temperatures around 65-75°F (18-24°C)

Humidity: Average indoor humidity levels

Growth Rate: Slow

); } export default PlantProfile;
